name: Deep Live Cam (GPU)
description: GPU-accelerated real-time face swapper with webcam, images, or videos.

install.command: venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime onnxruntime-gpu && pip install onnxruntime-gpu==1.16.3
source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime onnxruntime-gpu && pip install onnxruntime-gpu==1.16.3
source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime onnxruntime-coreml && pip install onnxruntime-coreml==1.13.1

notes: ⚠️ After install, place the following files in the `models/` folder manually:
You can find download links in the official Deep Live Cam GitHub README.
Make sure your system meets the GPU requirements:
- DirectML or OpenVINO not currently auto-installed (manual support needed)
